My last conversation with Cormac McCarthy, the acclaimed and elusive novelist who died last week at 89, came as unexpectedly as the first. 
Over six decades of winning every major literary award, in… [+8052 chars]

articles.description: While performing at her latest stop on The Eras Tour, the 33-year-old songstress stopped to confirm that she will be re-releasing Cruel Summer from her 2019 studio album, Lover.
articles.content:
